explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Ensured all referenced types are fully qualified (e.g., org.apache.http.entity.StringEntity, org.apache.http.util.EntityUtils, ClientPNames, CookiePolicy) so the function compiles correctly in isolation within the existing class.
exception_handling: Preserved the existing try/catch structure from the original logic without adding or removing any exception handling behavior.
logic_customization: Updated only the Accept header value, replacing the wildcard segment "*/*;q=0.5" with "*;q=0.5", resulting in "image/png,*;q=0.5". No other headers, control flow, or logic were changed.
refactoring: none
misc: none
